name: Time Corps
description:
A time-travelling runner game where you must dash to escape the nefarious Bureau of Time! Run through multiple eras of history in multiple levels!

Controls:

  • Space/W - Jump
  • Ctrl/S - Slide
  • E - Teleport
  • Jump in mid air again to double jump
  • Collect 20 batteries in order to teleport between levels

Time Corps made by Team Cliff.
